name: Vandoren Consulting
goal: As a consultant, I am offering my services in the fields of international trade (including trade defense), competition, intellectual property, public procurement, large civil aircraft and enlargement. Geographically, I offer my services at national, bilateral and multilateral level. As far as specific geographical areas are concerned, my experience covers South-East Europe, Russia, North and South America, Asia (in particular Japan, China and ASEAN) and Africa (North and Sub-Saharan).
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Trade, enlargement and neighborhood, common foreign and security policy, energy, public health, consumer policy.
EU-Russia relations and EU-USA relations.
customers: Mitsubishi Corporation International (Europe)LPC,Japan External Trade Organisation,Japan Machinery Center for Trade and Investment
